## Learning Objectives

By the end of this module, you will be able to:

* Explain the role of template partials in Quarto documents and how they differ from full template overrides.

* Locate and reference partial files in an existing Quarto template.

* Customize a template partial to change the appearance or content of specific sections without affecting the entire template.
